name: 'Holidaze Monster' hand painted custom vinyl figure
description:
'Holidaze Monster' hand painted vinyl figure by Cody Schibi

This was my VERY FIRST blank vinyl figure attempt...
This particular figure obviously falls in the Holiday theme. He's currently unnamed as he needs to find his rightful owner to give him one.  He proudly stands just over 4.5 inches tall & promises to be a good little guy throughout life.

4.5" hand painted vinyl figure
Acrylics & India Ink

One of a kind yo!

name: 'The Goat Man' CANVAS wrapped print on 1" wood cradle
description:
'The Goat Man' CANVAS wrapped print by Cody Schibi

The Legend of The Goat Man of Lake Worth continues to live on ever since it was captured in a grainy photograph back in 1969. Half-man, half-goat, this giant creature chases off/attacks anyone that encounters it. Witnesses have called it "...a snarling beast with claws over 8 inches long & eyes crazier than the dreaded 'Bachmann Monnster'..."

Here's the real deal though: 
It's just Nick. 
An old hermit who uses his love of makeup FX & costume design as a way to keep those "pesky kids" off his land. Scaring the b'jesus out of the trespassers has become his mission in life & a successful one it has been. 
Now finally captured in this portrait, here's Nick the Goat Man. Pin it to your front door to scare the kids off….


High quality, durable canvas wrapped print on 1" wood cradle w/ black border on wrap edges.
12"x18" CANVAS print READY TO HANG. 
Signed by the artist.

name: 'God Hates Astronauts' Hardcover Book
description:
'God Hates Astronauts' Hardcover Book by Ryan Browne

I finally got some extra copies of the HILARIOUS 'God Hates Astronauts: The Completely Complete Edition' which was just picked up by IMAGE & am ready to put them in your hungry, little hands!
I drew a two page origin story in this beast & am privileged to be included alongside some of my favorite illustrating buddies like Nick Pitarra, Ryan Browne, Greg & Fake Petre, CP Wilson III, Steve Seeley, Chris Burnham & the list goes on & on! Over 175 pages of beautiful art & high quality storytelling from Ryan Browne that will have you laughing out a lung...this book was meant for YOU.
All books come signed by Ryan Browne & myself along with a sketch from my right hand in the inside cover....FUN! 
You'll also receive a FREE God Hates Astronauts sticker, bookmark, poster AND tiny, limited print. Get yours now!

SYNOPSIS: 
"GHA follows the story of a group of incompetent, small-minded, super powered narcissists called "The Power Persons Five" who are hired by NASA to stop all farmers from launching themselves into space in homemade rocket ships. Unfortunately, for NASA, this goal is scarcely even addressed and the book focuses more on extramarital affairs, bank robing owls, big gross swollen heads, ghost cow heads, olde tyme boxers, tigers eating cheeseburgers in the Crab Nebula, buffalo judges and tons of aggressive swearing. Not as much a superhero book as it is a parody of basically everything and a celebration of weird that is jam-packed with references to Robo-Cop and Die Hard."

177 pages
Hardcover with gloss finish
7"x10.5"

name: HOLLISTON "Characters" T-Shirt
description: HOLLISTON "Characters" T-Shirt by Cody Schibi I'm not personally selling these shirts, but wanted to provide a link to Ariescope's online store so you guys can purchase them! CLICK HERE! I was approached by the HOLLISTON creator to illustrate the "characters" of the comedy/horror sitcom & being such a fan of Adam Green, Joe Lynch & ALL involved I jumped at the opportunity. If some of you who visit this site are unfamiliar with FEARnet's sitcom HOLLISTON, get familiar with it quickly...

name: 'Heads That Talk' limited AP screen print...
description: 'Heads That Talk' limited AP screen print by Cody Schibi Talking Heads is one of my favorites bands, yo. When I was approached by GUZU GALLERY about a SXSW 2013 art show they were putting together of artists interpreting their favorite band/musical icon, of course Talking Heads popped into MY talking head. Here's the end product of my FIRST ATTEMPT EVER at screen printing: 12.5"x12.5"(all artwork from the show was this size to match an album cover), 3-color screen print printed by the local badasses at Nakatomi Inc. There were only 40 included in the show & what you've got here are the Artist Proofs, signed/numbered limited to ONLY 15. Make your walls talk back & grab one! & oh yeah!..Talking Heads formed in 1975...THAT'S why I'm selling it for just THAT! FUN!

name: 'When The Evil Came' comic book + FREE sketch!
description: 'When The Evil Came' comic book by Cody Schibi & Fabian Rangel Jr. You like horror? You like comic books?! You like demons whose stomachs open up & grab you with their intestines?!?! If you said "Yes" to most or ALL of those then you MUST order this scary comic book thing that will guarantee to satisfy your horror-sweet tooth. I illustrated this 10-page tale written by my tattooed, freak buddy, Fabian Rangel Jr., which introduced me to these headaches known as "sequentials". Not only do you get 'When the Evil Came' BUT you FLIP THE WHOLE, DAMN COMIC BOOK AROUND & you get yet ANOTHER horror tale ('Stinky') written by Fabian & illustrated by Valentin Ramon Menendez! Yep...TWO 'Tales from the Crypt'-esque tales ready to hopefully make you talk in puns like the Cryptkeeper himself. This comic will come shipped with backing board & bag, signed AND you'll get a FREE sketch on said backing board by the same possessed, right hand that drew the HORROR in the comic! CRAZY!! Thanks for looking, boos & ghouls.... 24-page FULL COLOR, standard-sized, comic book Hand signed by artist with CUSTOM sketch on backing board FREE NIGHTMARES!!

name: 'oddities/deformities' mini art book W/ CUSTOM SKETCH
description: 'oddities/deformities' mini art book by Cody Schibi LIMITED SUPPLY (Alternate SEA SPRAY cover) Here's an odd, little collection of twisted things to lull you to sleep...or keep you up at night. This bad boy is a 16-front & back page book crawling with my black & white, ink & pen, fine-line detail work. Makes a great children's book! & if it gets cold, GREAT to burn...so stock up! 5.25" x 8" 16 pages hand signed by artist with a CUSTOM SKETCH inside...

name: 'Trick 'r Treat' LIMITED EDITION AP poster
description: Trick 'r Treat' LIMITED EDITION poster by Cody Schibi LIMITED SUPPLY Here's something that will SURELY keep you safe & protected by SAM himself ALL YEAR LONG! This 18"x24" poster is digitally printed on 90lb. text stock gloss & was released at the San Antonio screening of TRICK 'R TREAT on October 18, 2012. Only 100 were printed TOTAL. 70 NUMBERED ONLY posters were released at the screening while the little boogers I have here are SIGNED & NUMBERED, ARTIST PROOF POSTERS limited to 30. Only a few left, so grab one now. & oh yeah...ALWAYS CHECK YOUR CANDY!! 18"x24" on 90lb. Text Stock Gloss Hand signed & numbered by artist limited to an AP EDITION of 30.

name: 'CREEPSHOW' print
description:
'CREEPSHOW' print by Cody Schibi

One of THE greatest movies ever made. 
period.

11" x 17"
Hand signed by artist.

Released through BLOOD OVER TEXAS at Alamo Drafthouse's Terror Tuesday screening of "CREEPSHOW" as part of their "Summer of '82" collection.

name: 'The Thinking Demon' print
description:
'The Thinking Demon' by Cody Schibi

"During my travels through a far off, twisted land looking for new material & inspiration, I stumbled upon an unnamed creature sitting alone.  There was something oddly zen/peaceful about this guy, even though he just removed his own eyes!  I quickly did some scribbly, study sketches & took some notes to refer to later as this fellow sat there for hours & hours...never moving...only thinking.  I'm assuming he's still sitting in that exact spot I found him reflecting on his life which I'm sure is filled with wondrous tales. I luckily collected some of the demon's blood fresh from it's eye sockets & individually splattered it on every print making each one unique!  OH YES I DID!!

17" x 11" print.
Each print is different with hand-splattered, red watercolor added individually.
Hand signed by artist.

description:
'Eddie the Head' original illustration by Cody Schibi

Most of know this crazy mascot of rock band Iron Maiden.  I remember studying the cover art to their albums as a kid trying to recreate them with my tiny hand.
Ten Ton Studios had a weekly challenge to draw him, so I HAD to do it.
Here's my interpretation of Eddie the Head...

8.5"x11" ink on bristol board
One of a kind yo!

BAD SCAN...NO MARKS ON ILLUSTRATION

I painted this EXACT rendition of me for a Ten Ton Studio Weekly Challenge & had a blast doing so...

The Legend of The Goat Man of Lake Worth continues to live on ever since it was captured in a grainy photograph back in 1969. Half-man, half-goat, this giant creature chases off/attacks anyone that encounters it.  Witnesses have called it "...a snarling beast with claws over 8 inches long & eyes crazier than the dreaded 'Bachmann Monnster'..."

Here's the real deal though:
It's just Nick.
An old hermit who uses his love of makeup FX & costume design as a way to keep those "pesky kids" off his land. Scaring the b'jesus out of the trespassers has become his mission in life & a successful one it has been.
Now finally captured in this portrait, here's Nick the Goat Man. Pin it to your front door to scare the kids off....

11x17 print.
Signed by the artist.

name: 'Earl Grey & Chamomile' print
description:
'Earl Grey & Chamomile' print by Cody Schibi 

Chamomile's play date doesn't like photos, but I snapped this shot of Earl & herself in the country side of Surrey.  We laughed about it over tea a few minutes later...& then Earl bit my right hand off.

13.5" x 11" digital print. 
 
Hand signed by artist

Original watercolor/ink gesso panel painting was donated/sold at 'Expo For Mattia' in Naples, Italy 2011.

name: 'MUTANT NINJAS' print set
description:
'MUTANT NINJAS' print set by Cody Schibi

Everyone knows about these adorable, little, karate-chopping, teenage, mutant, ninja turtles, but here's the thing: they're MUTATED turtles from a stinky, poop-filled sewer!  How can they be SO DAMN CUTE?!  Welp, I went ahead & gave this some serious thought & after a few nights of scribbling, splattering, scanning & coloring, I came up with how these little radioactive bastards should REALLY look.  I mean...let's get realistic.

Made for the 'ArtSlam!: Martial ARTSlam' show in San Antonio on 9.24.11 

You get the WHOLE GROSS GANG: 
FOUR 5.5" x 8.5" Full Color prints.
Hand signed by artist.

name: 'MUTANT NINJAS: Donatello' print
description:
'MUTANT NINJAS: Donatello' print by Cody Schibi

Everyone knows about these adorable, little, karate-chopping, teenage, mutant, ninja turtles, but here's the thing: they're MUTATED turtles from a stinky, poop-filled sewer!  How can they be SO DAMN CUTE?!  Welp, I went ahead & gave this some serious thought & after a few nights of scribbling, splattering, scanning & coloring, I came up with how these little radioactive bastards should REALLY look.  I mean...let's get realistic.

Made for the 'ArtSlam!: Martial ARTSlam' show in San Antonio on 9.24.11 
5.5" x 8.5" Full Color print.
Hand signed by artist.

name: 'MUTANT NINJAS: Raphael' print
description:
'MUTANT NINJAS: Raphael' print by Cody Schibi

Everyone knows about these adorable, little, karate-chopping, teenage, mutant, ninja turtles, but here's the thing: they're MUTATED turtles from a stinky, poop-filled sewer!  How can they be SO DAMN CUTE?!  Welp, I went ahead & gave this some serious thought & after a few nights of scribbling, splattering, scanning & coloring, I came up with how these little radioactive bastards should REALLY look.  I mean...let's get realistic.

Made for the 'ArtSlam!: Martial ARTSlam' show in San Antonio on 9.24.11 
5.5" x 8.5" Full Color print.
Hand signed by artist.

name: Link vs. Superman print
description:
'Link vs. Superman' by Cody Schibi

You peeps ever lay awake at night & wonder who the winner of an epic battle between LINK (that cute, little Hylian boy from the Nintendo world) & the Man of Steel himself SUPERMAN would be?  Well, I do ALL THE TIME!  So one late night while this "hypothetical battle" was going on in my head, I jumped out of bed, cracked open my skull & poured this image out on paper.  Now you can lay awake at night & watch these two go at it on YOUR walls!  Geeky FUN!

Made for the ArtSlam!: Pixels vs. Panels show in San Antonio on 7.23.11
11" x 8.5" Full Color print.
Hand signed by artist.

name: Wolverine / Mario Mashup print
description:
'Wolverine / Mario Mashup' by Cody Schibi

"Let's take Wolverine & Mario, decapitate them, then sew their heads on the other one's body!" 
That's what my brain told me to do so that's exactly what I did in this print & now you can own this sick idea for yourself!

Made for the ArtSlam!: Pixels vs. Panels show in San Antonio on 7.23.11
11" x 8.5" Full Color print
Hand signed by artist.

name: COMMISSION: original 11"x17" ink illustration
description:
Here's your chance to boss me around & MAKE me draw WHATEVER YOU WANT!

In time for the Holiday I'm taking a VERY limited number of commissions. This one gets you an 11"x17" ink (black & white ONLY) illustration on bristol board. Please email me(codyschibi@gmail.com) after your purchase of the commission to discuss what you want me to scribble out. Nothing TOO crazy (ex: I want Batman AND Superman fighting Joker AND Lex Luther while Wolverine watches from the back a unicorn…as fun as that would be)… Please check out the examples to the left for an idea.
Looking forward to working with YOU!
